'''Aglahad''' ([[Third Age]] 2827 – 2932, aged 105 years) was the nineteenth [[Prince of Dol Amroth]].<ref name="Dol">{{PM|Elendil}}, ''The House of Dol Amroth'', p. 223</ref>

==History==
Aglahad was a descendant of [[Galador]], the first Prince of Dol Amroth; through Galador's mother [[Mithrellas]], Aglahad had some [[Half-elven|Elven blood]].<ref name="GalCel">{{UT|Galadriel}}</ref>

Aglahad ruled Dol Amroth around the time of [[Ruling Steward|Steward]] [[Turgon (Steward of Gondor)|Turgon]]. During Aglahad's reign as Prince, [[Gondor]] had to abandon much of [[Ithilien]].<ref>{{App|TA}}</ref>

After his death, his son [[Angelimir]] became the twentieth Prince.<ref name="Dol"/>
